content: hats are one of my favorite things to knit because they re quick and it s easy to get creative with them… creative with stitches and creative with the type of yarn you use and creative with color you only need one skein of this crazy sexy wool yarn and the large needles make this knit up super fast it s meant to be big and slouchy so feel free to adjust based on your size requirements follow me on instagram 1 to see what i m up to daily 1 https //www instagram com/ashley__lillis/
